overview: Sun-gyu was looking for a house when ends up living in Ji-won's house. One day, Ji-won is having phone sex with her boyfriend in the living room and Sun-gyu dreams of having sex with her. In the end, he gets a call girl to fullfill his needs but it's not enough. Meanwhile, Ji-won is looking for her missing underwear when Sun-gyu comes home and she approaches him...
title: Goals of the Boarding House Mistress
